Recipe.Description:
A.k.a. 'kitchen napalm', the OG thickener.
Approximately equal parts of fat and flour, cooked to varying degrees of doneness.

Ingredient.Name: Fat
Ingredient.Notes: Bacon grease, duck fat, schmaltz, tallow, clarified butter, etc.

Method.Step: Heat fat in a heavy bottomed skillet or pan.
Cook the roux, stirring constantly, until it reaches the desired shade.
